RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KARMA GHIA settled in the four path down the backstretch, shifted out five wide entering the stretch, surged under mild left handed urging and was along in time. HOLIDAY DECISION stalked the pace into the stretch, dug in between rivals late and got up for second. FRACING NASTY sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. VERY WEALTHY pressed the pace two wide into the stretch angled inside the leader at the furlong marker and weakened late. LOVE'S TAVITO was no factor. UNDERCOVER LADY had good early speed and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Fracing Nasty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Very Wealthy
ENTRY.OWNER: Lucas Ted W and Givens Charles

ENTRY.NAME: Karma Ghia
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 4path, surged late 5 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dug in between horses, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Undercover Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce February 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAYWING pressed the pace from the five then four path for a half, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and drew off under strong left handed urging. SAINT GOAR stalked the pace into the stretch, had a mild late rally three wide and finished second best. ODIE broke in front, set a pressured pace for a half along the inside then was outfinished. THRU THE VINE failed to menace. SO DIALED IN well placed, failed to respond. LATIN SPICE had brief speed. ESCAPE VELOCITY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Odie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace half, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Graywing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 5-4paths, took charge top lane, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Goar
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally, 3 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEA MONSTER drifted out to raced widest at the start, chased the leader into the stretch, made the lead then widened under right handed urging to win going away. CURIOSITY KILLS stalked the pace into the stretch, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished clear for second. HERO'S DAUGHTER saved ground and finished with good courage along the rail. LELAWALA trailed early then had a mild rally late. SPEEDY FIRE well placed inside, went evenly. LA MAMA CHULA failed to menace. IRON WILMA was no factor. TERRIFIC LADY settled mid pack then lacked the needed response. LUCKYWISE was through early. SIS BOOM BOB opened a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace to the top of the stretch then stopped abruptly.

ENTRY.NAME: Sea Monster
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, chased, full of run, right handed urging,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sis Boom Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, clear lead, stopped lane,

ENTRY.NAME: Curiosity Kills
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally 5path, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 30300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED SINCE SEPTEMBER 13 OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $40,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $22,000 Since January 13 Al lowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST CITIZEN made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace while nicely rated and won going away under a hand ride. JOHN'S ROCK stalked the pace into the stretch, improved position outside, drifted out late under a hand ride and finished clear for second. ENERGIZER checked repeatedly along the rail through the first turn, moved up to pressure the winner before a half, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then faded. COMPLY failed to menace. DISCLOSURE trailed early, moved up inside rivals on the far turn then came up empty. CHIEF RANDEL with the second flight three wide, gave way in the stretch. MIDNIGHT J J within striking distance for six furlongs, flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid into lane, drifted out late, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: First Citizen
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace, nicely rated, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Randel
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Energizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked repeatedly rail first turn, pressed, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight J J
ENTRY.OWNER: Sweet Carolina Racing and Bourbon LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 13. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWGIRL KIMMIE stalked the pace three wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew off under right handed urging to win going away. WESTLODGE INTRIGUE pressed the pace along the inside into the turn, dropped back a bit then came on again late in the five path to finished clear for second. BEAUTY DAY found her best stride late two wide. BEND THE KNEE broke in front, set a pressured pace two wide to the top of the stretch then weakened late. CHARGAREE close up five wide, finished evenly two wide. ROMANTIC JEWEL vied for the lead three wide into the stretch then faded. FLYING BUSINESS close up while hung outside into the stretch, failed to offer the needed response. TAPALONG had brief speed inside. LEADING INDICATOR was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Kimmie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, rallied right handed urging, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Westlodge Intrigue
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dropped back turn, came again 5p, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Bend the Knee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, 2 wide, inside, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pre ferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUMBER never far back, closed with a burst of speed five then four wide through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. MAGICAL EXPRESS close up along the inside early, shifted out six wide, surged late and just missed. PAT DADDY allowed to settle, offered a bid three wide into the stretch then was outfinished. EL BOHEMIO found his best stride late between horses. THE COOKIE MAN away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch then weakened. CLAW stalked the pace three then two wide through the turn, offered a bid along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. ENJOY BASEBALL broke slowly, trailed well back into the stretch then closed ground late along the inside. ATTUCK vied for the lead three wide into the stretch then came up empty. TOO LEGIT well placed, failed to respond. SOUTHERN WILL was no factor. SAVAGE NATION was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, bid 3 wide lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Magical Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, angled out upper stretch, rallied 6w, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Claw
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3-2wide, bid inside top lane, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Attuck
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and TEC Racing (Elliott S Logan)

ENTRY.NAME: Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, trailed far back, late gain, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Cumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late burst 5-4wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIP HIP HOORAY chased the pace along the inside into the stretch, responded readily when set down, made the lead two wide near the furlong marker and won under strong handling. SHANGHAI PRINCE away alertly, set the pace until mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner. WILD OX offered a bid four then three wide through the turn then leveled off. GARRETT failed to menace. KINGOFTHEBUCKEYE close up early five wide, dropped back on the turn then passed tiring rivals late. EL MARRO had brief speed. FIRST NAVY ADMIRAL chased the pace into the turn then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Hip Hip Hooray
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, late rally, 2 wide, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C Reed Stephen and Sugar John J
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, second best, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Kingofthebuckeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 5 wide, dropped back turn, passed tiring rivals

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRANDE RED bumped at the start, dueled for the early lead two wide, shook clear into the turn, set the balance of the pace, the rider lost his whip late and drew away under a hand ride. INDY CARR stalked the early pace inside, angled out on the turn, had a mild late rally in the six path and finished clear for second. RUNAWAY RUSSELL battled with the winner early along the inside, chased that one until deep stretch then faded. BIG TIME FLIRT passed tiring rivals along the inside. DANES HEART with the second flight two wide, gave way in the stretch. ALDUIN was outrun. A K A FIBBER MCGEE was through after a half. MY HOMBRE bumped with the winner at the start and had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Carr
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, angled out turn, rallied 6path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside early, chased, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Danes Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: McFadden Jr Joseph A and Fewster Melody K
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Grande Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, dueled, shook clear turn, lost whip late, drew off
